title: AI Interview Mocker
description: AI-powered platform designed to simulate real interview environments, helping users practice and prepare with confidence. Uses advanced AI models to conduct interviews, evaluate user responses, and offer insightful feedback for continuous improvement.
highlights: Advanced AI models for natural conversations

title: Medical Assistant - AI Healthcare Companion
description: Revolutionary healthcare management platform that combines AI with intuitive document processing. Streamlines medical workflows, enhances patient care, and provides intelligent insights through advanced document analysis and natural language processing.
highlights: Emergency health card with QR code
Mental health support and mood tracking

title: SafeCity - Urban Safety Monitoring
description: Modern safety monitoring application with real-time map integration, community features, and emergency services. Features interactive Google Maps with heatmap visualization, real-time community chat, and emergency SOS functionality.
highlights: Interactive Google Maps with heatmap visualization
Emergency SOS button with email alerts

title: Predictive Maintenance - Laptop RUL Prediction
description: Advanced AI-powered predictive maintenance platform that accurately predicts laptop remaining useful life using machine learning with 95.4% accuracy (R² score). Features real-time sensor data analysis, modern web interface, and production-ready ML pipeline.
